Class ControllerPrototyping::Factory
In: lib/controller_prototyping.rb
Parent: Object

Factory-class for controller-class generation

This class generates resource-specific controller-classes for a given resource out of the prototype-controller class.

Methods

create_controller_class   prototype_class_name   prototype_class_name=  

Public Class methods

create_controller_class(resources_name)

Creates the controller-class for the gicen resource-name out of the prototype-class.

prototype_class_name=(prototype_class_name)

Configures the class name of the prototype-class for controller generation. To support dynamic loading in development mode, only the name of the class is stored and constantized whenever needed.
